name: Subterfuge Sprint
description:
Version 0.2b

Subterfuge Sprint is an infinite runner game made in Unity and my first game.

Future additions:

  • Spikes
  • Powerups
  • Optimize for mobile
  • More platform variety
  • Better performance
  • New graphic assets
